personaldata.name: Friedrich Nietzsche (1844-1900)
personaldata.shortbio: German philosopher, cultural critic, composer, poet, philologist, and a Latin and Greek scholar whose work has exerted a profound influence on Western philosophy and modern intellectual history.

achievements.title: Germania
achievements.description: Led a music and literature club during summers in Naumburg.

getintouch.caption: Are You Curious?
getintouch.title: There's a lot to read by (and about) Nietzsche!
getintouch.description: Nietzsche has written more than 15 books which have been translated into all major languages. Check them out. You'll be amazed by his writing.
